casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Darryl CRENSHAW Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2017

David J. Reich, in support of the petition.

Rocco A. Chiarenza, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn. App. 526, 161 A.3d 638 (2017), is denied.
